alert.note: Alert for Cherry (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 06 at 3:44PM CDT until June 06 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 PM MDT FOR SOUTH CENTRAL CHERRY COUNTY... At 244 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 22 miles southwest of Merritt Reservoir, or 26 miles north of Mullen, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Highway 97 crossing the North Loup River, Marsh Flat, Highway 97 crossing Big Creek and Sevenmile Hill. This includes Highway 97 between mile markers 85 and 98. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
